text: the quality of the food is acceptable although the portion sizes are small and the average price for a main course is around 50 however the beautiful view makes it worth going up and taking a look i believe that next time i will dine somewhere with more delicious options and only visit this place for its barlounge
out of all the hotels weve ever been to this one takes the cake its enormous rooms delightful views and perfect location make it unbeatable giving you a sensation of conquering the world

what if there was signage clearly stating the operating hours there were instances where various groups had to wait for an extended period so why not utilize a digital sign that simply reads closed this straightforward approach would significantly improve customer service

while its not terrible it wouldnt be my top pick for the location the staff is amicable and the food is enjoyable but it exudes a strong maledominated ambiance nonetheless if youre seeking a proper dinner experience especially for guys this place could suffice although i believe there may be something missing that would make it truly outstanding

while its not awful i wouldnt consider it my top choice for the area the staff is friendly and the food is good but it has a strong mans club feel to it that being said it can be a great place for guys looking for a satisfying dinner experience but in my opinion theres something missing that would make it even better

unsure of how to assign an adequate star rating my hesitation stems from the fact that the food is truly exceptional especially the x girlfriend roll regrettably the service provided at this establishment remains consistently abysmal despite numerous attempts to enjoy a pleasant dining experience the recurring presence of unfriendly and disinterested staff members has left me with little desire to patronize this place again

this place is great for pizza lovers like me who appreciate the authentic italian way of tearing into a slice the pizza itself was fantastic with no excessive oiliness and the service was prompt and attentive however when i visited with a friend we both felt that the atmosphere was lacking vibrancy while the cleanliness was commendable it would be even better if they could add some liveliness to elevate the overall experience

despite not having made a reservation i managed to get seated at this place although it was a bit expensive and the quality of their nail services was not impressive interestingly i did receive a discount by checking in but my total expenditure was still 95
one of my favorite places to eat if im looking for cheap and fast
it was mediocre considering the high cost for a diner and the wait staff displayed a hint of aloofness
i have been to three smashburgers around az and this is by far the best one at least at this location there is consistency food is made well and warm it is a bit expensive but quite good i think
its quite pleasant and sanitary at this place but i feel they ought to inject some energy into the ambiance as my friend and i found it lacking in liveliness

i really liked this place and how they serve the pizza just like in italy the pizza was amazing and not oily and the servers were quick in refilling our drinks though when i went there with a friend we both noticed that the atmosphere seemed somewhat dull it was clean and nice but it could use some liveliness

previously i was a big fan of wicked spoon but this place has now become the number one buffet in las vegas for me every dish was excellent and i couldnt find any major errors while some items were better than others overall this buffet was amazing

i hold a special fondness for this place having been a loyal customer for years ive perfected the technique of making their renowned smash dish and continue to be amazed by their everchanging array of delectable options every item on their menu showcases freshness and incredible flavors the wait times are impressive due to streamlined processes and the management and staff consistently radiate warmth and friendliness
this pizza left such an awful taste in my mouth making it the worst food ive ever consumed
dragon jasmine hot tea is amazing

during my visit to this establishment i thoroughly enjoyed the experience of tearing into the pizza like they do in italy the pizza itself was excellent not greasy at all and the servers were efficient in refilling our drinks however i couldnt help but feel that the atmosphere lacked energy and excitement

the hummus ive tried is the best ive ever had its so versatile that i use it in everything and there are so many different flavors to choose from my favorite combination is garlic hummus with beet hummus but i also add other flavors to dishes as a flavor booster its absolutely delicious
having visited this place four times already i can say that each time has resulted in a fantastic spray tan experience i am planning to return shortly
although the store is known for its great prices their takeout pizza is not up to par the crust was so bad that we had to throw away most of it

with a luxurious and inviting atmosphere one would expect a more reasonable price point at this place however the cost is too high for what they offer  youll be shelling out 20 dollars for just a glass of wine
the diner was decent but a little costly and the waitstaff seemed a bit distant

im a huge fan of innout but this location is simply awful my food was cold when it finally arrived and i had to endure a 20minute wait at the drivethru window just for a burger this place seriously needs to step up their game
original phrase i have been here four times now and have had a great spray tan experience each time i will be back soon
i have frequented this place four times and without fail i have had an excellent spray tan experience each time i will definitely be returning in the near future

i used to be a big fan of wicked spoon but now this place has become my top choice for buffets in vegas every item was delicious and i couldnt find any noticeable mistakes while some dishes may be superior to others the overall experience of this buffet was outstanding

the food took an unusually long time to be served and was disappointingly unappetizing however the restaurants saving grace is the captivating collection of united states art exhibited in the dining room the children especially enjoyed admiring the depictions of the different states
absolutely loved the crispy duck with drunken noodles at the thai restaurant  it was cooked to perfection and easily the best thai food ive ever had

the cuisine here is decent but the serving sizes are a bit on the smaller side you can expect to pay around 50 for a typical main course nevertheless the picturesque view makes it worthwhile to go upstairs and take a look in my opinion ill choose to dine at a tastier place next time and only visit this location for its barlounge area

its adequate yet falls short of being my preferred choice in this area the staff members here are quite friendly and the cuisine is rather satisfying however the atmosphere tends to lean heavily towards a masculine club vibe that said it does serve as an excellent dinner destination specifically catering to mens preferences nevertheless i sense that theres a certain element lacking which would enhance the overall experience
you can always count on the pizza wing special to be delicious and satisfying
without a doubt this is the most exceptional hotel experience weve had so far the immense rooms stunning vistas and fantastic location make you feel like youre on the highest peak

food is okay but service was one of the worst ive ever seen  perhaps the waiter didnt like us because we only ordered appetizers and beer  but i would not expect this kind of attitude at this kind of restaurant

this is my initial visit and i decided to try the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel while it wasnt the absolute worst the chicken lacked sufficient flavor to capture my attention as for the falafel im no connoisseur but it had an overpowering taste of parsley which left a strong bitter and grassy sensation
although the appearance of this venue suggests elegance and charm it falls short in terms of affordability dont be surprised when a glass of wine costs a hefty 20 dollars its simply overpriced

this place holds a special place in my heart ive frequented it for several years now honing my skills to prepare their famous smash dish perfectly they constantly innovate their menu offering a plethora of new choices that are always prepared with utmost freshness and exquisite flavors the waiting times are impressively short thanks to the efficient service the management and staff never fail to delight with their warm and affable nature

i made two attempts to reserve a table at this restaurant for dinner but during the first one they asked us to wait and left us on hold until we eventually hung up on the second try they didnt even bother answering the phone its unfortunate because ive heard that the food here is excellent however i wont be bringing my patronage to this establishment

i found it difficult to rate this place as i wasnt sure how many stars to give while i really enjoyed the food especially the x girlfriend roll the service was consistently horrible every time i went there the staff always appeared grumpy and seemed like they didnt want to be there because of this i dont think ill be going back anytime soon

i have a strong affinity for innout however this specific establishment fails to meet expectations on one occasion the meal i received was served cold while the duration of my stay at the drivethru exceeded 20 minutes given that i had merely ordered a burger this lack of efficiency displayed by the staff is truly disheartening it is indispensable that they make improvements promptly

this hotel surpasses all others weve ever visited in terms of excellence with its expansive rooms delightful views and perfect location its simply unbeatable making you feel like youre conquering the world

i deeply cherish this establishment it has been my goto spot for many years during which i have mastered the art of crafting their renowned smash selection their everevolving array of dishes ensures theres something exciting to try every time all of which boast outstanding quality and delectable tastes the wait times are impressively brief as they have streamlined their processes remarkably well the amiable disposition exhibited by the management and staff always adds a delightful touch to the overall experience

despite my love for innout this specific branch is extremely disappointing on one occasion my food arrived cold and i had to wait at the window for over 20 minutes even though all i ordered was a burger the service here seriously needs improvement

contemplating the number of stars to award my uncertainty arises from the contrasting qualities of this establishment undoubtedly the food is superb particularly the highly enjoyable x girlfriend roll unfortunately the service consistently proves to be utterly deplorable no matter how many times i have visited each encounter leaves me dismayed by the persistently grumpy and unmotivated staff members prompting me to seriously consider not returning here in the future

at this venue i caught the showing of g force in 3d for a price of 1050 per ticket the theater itself was quite large clean and boasted topnotch audio which left me satisfied right before you enter theres a food court so i suggest bringing a sizable bag so you can buy your food ahead of time oh did i already mention that
while the store offers amazing discounts their pizza is a disappointment we had to discard most of it due to the terrible crust

we have never experienced a hotel as outstanding as this one before the large rooms beautiful scenery and ideal location make you feel like youre soaring above everything else

on my first visit i opted for the chicken schwarma wrap and falafel although it didnt rank as the most disappointing meal ever the chicken didnt have enough flavor to captivate me as for the falafel i dont consider myself an expert but there was an overwhelming presence of parsley resulting in a pronounced bitter and grasslike taste
kinda weird for a japanese place to be in a diner food was expensive and not that great   if im paying these prices i want good quality   id pass on this place

came by for a last minute ironing on my dress shirt for the wedding anna helped me out and was very nice and gave me great service knowing the time crunch i was in would definitely use them again if i was in the area and needed something done

i struggled to decide on the number of stars to give due to the conflicting experiences i had on one hand the food was amazing and i particularly loved the x girlfriend roll however the service was consistently terrible every time i visited the staff seemed grumpy and uninterested in their job based on this i most likely wont be returning
experience the consistently excellent pizza wing special every single time

while this store boasts great discounts their takeout options leave much to be desired especially their pizza which has a truly unpleasant taste and an appalling crust resulting in us discarding the majority of it

this hummus is unparalleled in terms of quality and taste its diverse flavor options make it an indispensable ingredient in my kitchen enhancing a multitude of dishes my personal favorite combination is the garlic hummus alongside the beautifully complementing beet hummus presenting an irresistible culinary experience additionally incorporating the other flavors adds an extra layer of deliciousness to my cooking

i attempted to make a reservation at this restaurant twice for dinner but during the first try they asked us to wait and then left us on hold until we eventually hung up on the second attempt they didnt even answer the phone its unfortunate because ive heard good things about the food here but i wont be giving them my business

the cleanliness of the store and the convenience of a selfcheckout option are major strengths nevertheless its unfortunate that the pharmacy used to be available round the clock but recently decided to discontinue that service as a result i switched to a store that is closer in proximity moreover their consistent struggle to keep my prescribed medications in stock has caused notable inconvenience on a different note treating myself to their delicious fried chicken brings about a sense of guilt yet enjoyment
can i classify this place as a fast food spot despite the fact that they stop serving breakfast at 10 in the morning

the pricetag wasnt commensurate with the experience leading me to not want to go back as it was rather unimpressive

the cuisine here is alright but the serving sizes are rather petite and you can expect to pay around 50 for a typical entree nonetheless the picturesque vista justifies making the effort to go upstairs and take a peek in my opinion ill opt for a more flavorsome dining experience elsewhere and reserve this place for relaxing in the bar or lounge area

i did not like their food at all had one dish sent it back the second plate was just as horrible not close to authentic mexican food at all the atmosphere is very nice though the authentic music made the atmosphere even better havent gone back since i went the first time go at your own risk
today i passed by this location and discovered that its closed

let me tell you about the most fantastic hummus ive ever tasted its so versatile that i use it in all sorts of meals thanks to its diverse range of flavors my absolute favorite combination is garlic hummus with a hint of beet hummus additionally adding other flavorpacked hummus varieties turns any dish into a culinary delight  utterly delicious

this hummus is truly exceptional i include it in countless recipes due to its wide array of delectable flavors personally i love pairing garlic hummus with beet hummus while the remaining varieties serve as delightful enhancements that enrich the taste of my dishes
delicious fresh fruit smoothies and veggie food too

i saw g force in 3d here and the tickets cost 1050 the theater was big clean and had excellent sound quality which made me happy moreover theres a food court right before you enter so make sure to bring a big bag and get your food before you go in oh did i already say that
the price wasnt justified and i have no desire to return as it was quite uneventful

this establishment is as advertised   it provides outstanding quality regardless of price   what is interesting to observe is their prices are substantially lower than anyone else that offers quality on the las vegas strip  kudos
the ambience seemed lacking when i went to this place with a friend it was clean and nice but it could use more liveliness

i recently tried this place for the first time and ordered the chicken schwarma wrap along with some falafel it wasnt the worst meal ive ever had but the chicken lacked the necessary flavor to make it truly enticing regarding the falafel i must admit that im not exactly a falafel aficionado but this particular version had a distinctive and somewhat unpleasant bitterness due to the abundance of parsley giving it a grassy undertone

i thoroughly enjoyed the chicken shawarma with a side of hummus falafel and salad the whole meal was outstanding furthermore it was accompanied by a large soft piece of pita bread which was equally impressive unlike most pita that is typically hard and thin this one was irresistibly soft fluffy and absolutely delicious
during my visit earlier today to this location at 11212 i found out that it is closed
110hr for labor ridiculous dan is the slowest and most ill informed person i have ever dealt with
the food is the same but the retro experience i love is lost at this location its not sit and serve its pay sit serve its closer to a smash burger experience than a true jrockets

the waiting time for the food was excessively long and the taste fell below expectations however the redeeming quality of the restaurant lies in its impressive display of united states art in the dining area which adds to its appeal additionally the children found great joy in exploring the artwork depicting the states
having been here four times already i can confidently say that each visit has provided me with a wonderful spray tan experience it wont be long before i return for another round

phillys is your basic nofrills sports bar it is nothing to swoon over but it is laid back and a fun hangout spot  the staff was nice too and it was actually really refreshing to not be surrounded by a bunch of scottsdale aholes
indulge in the consistently fantastic pizza wing special
the way the crispy duck with drunken noodles was prepared at the thai eatery was spoton leaving me with no doubt that it was the best thai cuisine ive ever experienced

the hummus ive had is the greatest and i incorporate it into various dishes because of its extensive range of flavors my preferred combination is garlic hummus mixed with beet hummus the other flavors give an extra kick to my meals  simply scrumptious
i ordered the 5 fried tacos the filling was a little bland at first i couldnt tell if it was shredded chicken or beef it was ok if i go back id would try a different dish thats a big if

although not unpleasant it wouldnt be my primary option when considering this particular locality the staff at this establishment is affable and the quality of their food is commendable although the environment seems excessively reminiscent of a gentlemens club still for men who actively seek an enjoyable dinner outing it can certainly be deemed a notable spot personally i feel that it lacks a certain ingredient to elevate it further

during the summer season customers can enjoy the great atmosphere provided by the pleasant outdoor seating and have a taste of their nicely brewed coffee which boasts a distinct character unfortunately the lack of internet availability on weekends raises questions about their modernity as a coffee shop aiming to improve turnover its disheartening to encounter such unreliable internet service which also experiences frequent disruptions throughout the week
while the cleanliness and appearance of this place were commendable the atmosphere felt somewhat dull during my visit with a friend  perhaps some vibrancy would enhance it

while the food is decent the portion sizes tend to be on the smaller side and the average cost for a main dish is approximately 50 nevertheless the stunning scenery makes it worthwhile to ascend and enjoy the view personally my plan for the future is to dine at a more delectable establishment and solely visit this location for its bar and lounge amenities

i have a deep appreciation for innout but this particular outlet fails to meet expectations i experienced the disappointment of receiving cold food once and to make matters worse i had to wait for more than 20 minutes at the drivethru window despite ordering only a burger the staffs lack of efficiency seriously undermines the quality of service provided it is crucial that they address these issues promptly

the food took a considerable amount of time to arrive and didnt meet our taste preferences nevertheless the restaurants standout feature is the striking collection of united states art showcased throughout the dining room notably the children were particularly enthralled by the opportunity to admire the intricate depictions of various states
is it accurate to describe this eatery as a fast food joint if their breakfast service ends at 10 oclock
it wasnt worth the money spent and i wont be revisiting because it was fairly dull
i passed through this area today specifically at 11212 and noticed that the establishment is not open
we have never stayed at a hotel as amazing as this one before it gives you a feeling of being on cloud nine with its spacious rooms breathtaking views and unbeatable location
the dining experience was alright although slightly overpriced for a casual restaurant and the waiters appeared somewhat indifferent

at this venue i caught the 3d screening of g force for a price of 1050 per ticket the average theater was sizable wellmaintained and provided exceptional audio that left me satisfied i also noticed a food court just before entering so its advisable to bring a large bag and purchase your food ahead of time by the way did i already mention this

i tried on two occasions to make a reservation at this particular restaurant for an evening meal during the first attempt the staff requested that we wait on the line only to keep us waiting indefinitely until we finally decided to end the call disappointingly during my second endeavor they didnt even bother picking up the phone its a shame because ive heard great things about the quality of their cuisine but i wont be choosing this place as my dining destination

the atmosphere has an incredibly posh and irresistibly welcoming vibe but the cost of their goods and services far exceeds what one would expect be prepared to shell out a whopping 20 for just one glass of wine

i had a highly satisfactory experience with swift pleasant service and a wellinformed individual taking my order the one aspect that prevented it from being a perfect fivestar experience was the lack of a distinct choice for a smoothie with low carbs or low sugar as the nutrition details listed on the menu were unclear

the cleanliness of the store and the availability of a selfcheckout facility are major strengths however its disappointing that the pharmacy used to operate round the clock but recently decided to discontinue that service because of this i had to switch to a store nearer to where i reside furthermore their consistent inability to keep my required medications in stock has caused significant inconvenience on a different note i find immense pleasure in indulging myself with their guiltypleasureworthy fried chicken
